content:
hello, is this the correct stream for IG generation questions? Not clear to me how to add an "id" to a dependsOn in an implementation guide... I have 

"dependsOn": [
      "uri" : "http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.us.core",
      "packageId": "hl7.fhir.us.core",
      "version" : "3.1.0"
]

and the publisher complains Dependency 'hl7.fhir.us.core' has no id, so can't be referred to in markdown in the IG
oops, just saw IG creation stream. will xpost
ah, is it related ro version, or can it be "unicorn"?
